short_summary: TSPS \\( Task and Solutions Professional Services \\) National Capital Region (NCR)
description: A notification of proposed procurement requirement of TSPS \\( Task and Solutions Professional Services \\) in the National Capital Region (NCR)
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS)
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task and Solution Professional Services (TSPS). The contract period will be for one year, with the option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**solicitation Number:** 202301524/A

**solicitation Date:** August 25, 2023

**Closing Date:** September 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Estimated Level of Effort:** Two (2) Level 3 Staffing Consultants, with a combined 340 work days per year. This estimate is based on an initial contract period of 170 days, with an optional extension of up to two additional 170-day periods.

**Service Category:** Human Resources Services (8.010100)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

The RCMP seeks the services of two (2) Level 3 Staffing Consultants. To be eligible for this RFP, Suppliers must be pre-qualified under E60ZT-18TSPS and have the required expertise in the National Capital Region. A complete list of eligible candidates is provided below.

**List of Eligible Suppliers:**
1. Beva Global Management Inc.
2. Dare Human Resources Corporation
3. Human Resources Systems Group Ltd.
4. Knockri Inc.
5. Lynda Naveda Consulting Ltd.
6. Maverin Business Services Inc.
7. Odgers Berndtson Canada Inc.
8. Portage Personnel Inc.
9. Prosmo Inc.
10. Protak Consulting Group Inc.
11. Quarry Consulting Inc.
12. Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
13. Samson RH Inc.
14. The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated
15. The VCAN Group Inc.
16. VidCruiter Inc.

The work will involve providing staffing consulting services to the RCMP on an "as and when requested" basis. 

**Clearance Requirements:**
The selected Supplier must hold a minimum clearance level of FA2 RCMP Clearance, as per the Security Requirements for the Contract.

**Required Documents:** Suppliers must submit the following documents:
- company registration information (e.g., business ID, location)
- proof of required security clearance
- detailed service proposal, including biographies of key personnel

**Point of Contact:**
For any inquiries or clarification on the requirements, please contact:
Michelle
